## hpr3055 :: Advice to new Fediverse administrators and developers

 Framasoft is a company that develops for PeerTube and Mobilizon, and also hosts a Mastodon instance. The speaker is the sysadmin for the Mastodon instance gives his tips based on his experience at this non-profit company. https://www.zwilnik.com/?page_id=1098
Links:

https://redaktor.me/apconf/
https://archive.org/details/apconf-talks/Talk1_Luc_compressed.mov
https://frama.link/ap-conf-2019
https://joinpeertube.org/
https://joinmobilizon.org/en/
https://soutenir.framasoft.org/en/
https://www.zwilnik.com/?page_id=1034
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fediverse
https://www.zwilnik.com/?page_id=1098
